content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

4->2->12

The shortest path from node 4 to node 12 is through nodes 2 and 12. The intermediate nodes along the path are 11, 13, and 14. Please note that this shortest path does not include any of the other nodes mentioned in the provided graph.

12->4->7->12

The shortest path from node 12 to node 4 is through nodes 4, 7, and 12. Please note that this shortest path does not include any of the other nodes mentioned in the provided graph.
